faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about implementing ELVIRA at your hotel.

items.question: How long does it take to implement ELVIRA at our hotel?
items.answer: Implementation typically takes 2-3 weeks from signing to full deployment. Our team handles the setup, configuration, and staff training to ensure a smooth transition.

items.question: Does ELVIRA require special hardware or IT infrastructure?
items.answer: No, ELVIRA is a cloud-based solution that works with your existing infrastructure. All your hotel needs is reliable Wi-Fi and standard computers for the management dashboard.

items.question: Can ELVIRA integrate with our existing PMS and listing systems?
items.answer: Yes, ELVIRA is designed to integrate with popular property management systems and listing engines. Our team will work with you to ensure smooth integration with your existing systems.

items.question: How do guests access the platform?
items.answer: Guests simply scan a QR code in their room, which connects them to your hotel's Wi-Fi and redirects them to the login page. They then enter their room number and a unique verification code provided at check-in.

items.question: Is guest data secure and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. ELVIRA operates on a room-based session system rather than personal data collection. We comply with global data protection regulations including GDPR and CCPA.

items.question: Can we customize the look and features of ELVIRA?
items.answer: Yes, ELVIRA is fully customizable. Hotels can adjust branding, choose which features to display, and manage content through an intuitive dashboard.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing and plans.

items.question: How is pricing determined?
items.answer: Our pricing is primarily based on the number of rooms in your hotel. We offer three tiers: Starter for small hotels (up to 25 rooms), Professional for medium-sized hotels (26-75 rooms), and Enterprise for larger hotels or small chains (76+ rooms).

items.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the monthly fee?
items.answer: The monthly subscription covers all standard features within your tier. There may be additional costs for custom development work, specialized integrations with third-party systems not included in your tier, or optional add-on modules.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for annual payments?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for annual payment plans across all tiers. This not only provides savings but also ensures uninterrupted service for your guests throughout the year.

items.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time, with the new rate taking effect immediately. Downgrades can be processed at the end of your current billing cycle. Our team will help ensure a smooth transition.

items.question: Is there a setup fee?
items.answer: There is no setup fee for Starter and Professional plans. Enterprise plans may include a one-time implementation fee depending on the complexity of your requirements and customizations needed.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day trial for the Starter and Professional plans. For Enterprise clients, we provide a comprehensive demo tailored to your specific needs before commitment.

introduction.p1: ELVIRA DIGITAL CONCIERGE ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our digital concierge platform, website, and services.
introduction.p2: We take data privacy seriously, especially in the hospitality industry where trust is paramount. Our platform is built around the principle of minimizing personal data collection while maximizing service quality.

hotelPartner.title: 2.1 Hotel Partner Information
hotelPartner.intro: For hotels using our platform, we collect:
hotelPartner.item1: Business contact information (names, email addresses, phone numbers)
hotelPartner.item2: Hotel details (address, number of rooms, services offered)
hotelPartner.item4: Login credentials for the management dashboard

guest.title: 2.2 End User (Guest) Information
guest.intro: Our platform is designed with privacy in mind. For hotel guests using our service, we collect minimal information:
guest.item1: Room number (temporarily associated with the session)
guest.item3: Service requests and preferences during their stay
guest.note: Importantly, we do not collect personal identification information from guests. The system operates on anonymous, room-based sessions that expire after checkout.

automatic.title: 2.3 Automatically Collected Information
automatic.intro: When you access our platform, we may automatically collect:
automatic.item4: Cookies and similar technologies (see our Cookie Policy)

usage.intro: We use the collected information to:
usage.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
usage.item2: Process transactions and fulfill service requests
usage.item3: Communicate with hotel partners about their account
usage.item4: Respond to inquiries and provide support
usage.item5: Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends
usage.item6: Protect against unauthorized access and ensure platform security

sharing.intro: We may share information in the following circumstances:
sharing.item1: Hotel Partners: Guest service requests and communications are shared with the relevant hotel staff to fulfill requests.
sharing.item2: Service Providers: We engage trusted third parties to help us operate our business (e.g., hosting, analytics, payment processing).
sharing.item3: Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law, regulation, or legal process.
sharing.item4: Business Transfers: If ELVIRA is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
sharing.note: We do not sell or rent user data to third parties for marketing purposes.

security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

transfers.p1: Our services may be hosted and processed in various countries, including outside your country of residence. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries that may have different data protection rules than your country.

retention.p1: We retain hotel partner information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Guest session data is automatically deleted after checkout plus a brief retention period for service quality and security purposes.

rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your information, including:
rights.item1: Accessing, correcting, or deleting your information
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.

children.p1: Our services are not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. The updated version will be indicated by an updated "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy frequently.
